text: وَلَوْلَآ أَن ثَبَّتْنَـٰكَ لَقَدْ كِدتَّ تَرْكَنُ إِلَيْهِمْ شَيْـًٔا قَلِيلًا

translation.en.sahih: And if We had not strengthened you, you would have almost inclined to them a little.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan kalau Kami tidak memperkuat (hati)mu, niscaya kamu hampir-hampir condong sedikit kepada mereka,
